name: Brand Performance Report
query:
WITH
item AS (
    SELECT
        name AS item_code,
        item_name,
        brand
    FROM
        `tabItem`
),
sales AS (
    SELECT
        si_item.item_code,
        SUM(si_item.qty) AS qty,
        SUM(si_item.net_amount) AS net_amount
    FROM
        `tabSales Invoice Item` si_item
    INNER JOIN
        `tabSales Invoice` si
    ON
        si_item.parent = si.name
    WHERE
        si_item.docstatus = 1
        AND si.docstatus = 1
        AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY
        si_item.item_code
),
cogs AS (
    SELECT
        item_code,
        SUM(stock_value_difference) * -1 AS stock_value_difference
    FROM
        `tabStock Ledger Entry`
    WHERE
        is_cancelled = 0
        AND voucher_type IN ('Sales Invoice', 'Delivery Note')
        AND posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY
        item_code
),
stock AS (
    SELECT
        item_code,
        SUM(actual_qty) AS actual_qty
    FROM
        `tabStock Ledger Entry`
    WHERE
        is_cancelled = 0
        AND posting_date <= %(to_date)s
    GROUP BY
        item_code
)
SELECT
    item.brand,
    IFNULL(SUM(sales.qty), 0) AS sales_qty,
    IFNULL(SUM(sales.net_amount), 0) AS sales_amount,
    IFNULL(SUM(cogs.stock_value_difference), 0) AS sales_cost,
    IFNULL(SUM(sales.net_amount), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(cogs.stock_value_difference), 0) AS gross_profit,
    (IFNULL(SUM(sales.net_amount), 0) - IFNULL(SUM(cogs.stock_value_difference), 0)) / IFNULL(SUM(cogs.stock_value_difference), 0) * 100 AS markup,
    IFNULL(stock.actual_qty, 0) AS stock_qty
FROM
    item
LEFT JOIN
    sales
ON
    item.item_code = sales.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    cogs
ON
    item.item_code = cogs.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    stock
ON
    item.item_code = stock.item_code
WHERE
    ABS(IFNULL(sales.qty, 0)) + IFNULL(stock.actual_qty, 0) > 0
GROUP BY
    item.brand
ORDER BY
    item.brand,
    IFNULL(sales.qty, 0) DESC
